title: FM Jilani reaffirms Pakistan’s commitment to NAM, its principles
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP): Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani on Wednesday reiterated Pakistan’s commitment to the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) and its founding principles.
The foreign minister attended the Ministerial meeting of the 19th NAM Summit in Kampala, Uganda, Foreign Office Spokesperson posted on her official X account.
The caretaker foreign minister emphasized that Pakistan would continue to support the Movement’s efforts towards peace, equality, cooperation and well-being for all.
He called for just, peaceful and expeditious resolution of the longstanding Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu and Kashmir (IIOJK) and Palestine disputes.
